feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light and dark theme color tokens and base elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with boot fallback UI and metadata for the Digital Asset Vault app.
frontend/public/health.html: Standalone health check page with styled system status and environment details.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component wiring providers, header, and dashboard, dispatching an app-mounted event once.
frontend/src/components/BalanceView.tsx: Balance display component with manual refresh, live update toggle, metadata cache clearing, and token table rendering.
frontend/src/components/ContractInfo.tsx: Displays contract address, owner info, and network details with copy-to-clipboard and BscScan link.
frontend/src/components/DepositForm.tsx: Provides UI and logic for depositing BNB or tokens into the vault and logs transactions.
frontend/src/components/DiagnosticsBar.t: Shows build and environment info and allows copying diagnostics and performance data.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Catches and displays application errors with reload and troubleshooting options.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders footer with branding, build metadata, and attribution links.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays app branding, wallet connect bar, and theme toggle in the top header.
frontend/src/components/TokenSelectorInp: Lets users select or manually enter a token address with dropdown search and manual mode.
frontend/src/components/TransactionHisto: Displays a scrollable transaction history with status badges, hash/address shortening, and a clear-history option using useTxHistory.
frontend/src/components/VaultBalancesTab: Renders BNB and token balances with optional USD/BNB valuations and loading states.
frontend/src/components/WalletConnect.ts: Manages wallet connection flow, network switching, mobile instructions, and initialization states using useWeb3.
frontend/src/components/WalletConnectTop: Top-bar wallet status component showing connection, network state, and actions to connect or switch networks.
frontend/src/components/WithdrawForm.tsx: Withdrawal form for BNB and tokens with validation, transaction initiation, history logging, and balance display.
frontend/src/global.d.ts: Extends Window typing to include Ethereum provider fields for MetaMask compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
Fetches BNB and token prices to compute USD and BNB valuations for balances, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout handlers, and manages identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing because Web3 is used instead of IC backend queries.
Manages a persistent token catalog in localStorage with label editing, removal, and dropdown option generation.
frontend/src/hooks/useTokenMetadataCache: Caches token metadata in localStorage with get/set/clear operations to reduce repeated RPC calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useTxHistory.ts: Stores and updates local transaction history and polls for receipt confirmations via provider or RPC.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultBalances.ts: Fetches vault BNB and token balances with metadata caching, timeouts, fallback behavior, and optional polling.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultInfo.ts: Fetches and exposes the vault owner address with loading and error state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultOperations.ts: Provides deposit and withdrawal functions for interacting with the vault contract, tracking loading states and encoding transactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useWatchedTokens.ts: Manages a persistent, validated list of token addresses using localStorage with add, remove, and lookup utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeb3.tsx: Implements a Web3 context for wallet connection, network switching, contract calls, and tracking connection state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles and color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/appBranding.ts: Exports app branding constants including names, tagline, identifier, and helpers to get them.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Stores build version metadata and utilities for retrieving build identifiers and deployed build info.
frontend/src/lib/contracts.ts: Provides vault contract address, method signatures, and utilities for encoding and decoding contract calls.
frontend/src/lib/evm.ts: Supplies EVM utilities for address validation, ABI encoding/decoding, and unit conversions using BigInt.
frontend/src/lib/evmAbiText.ts: Implements ABI text decoding helpers for ERCâ€‘20 metadata such as symbol and name.
frontend/src/lib/performanceCheck.ts: Collects build and browser timing data and formats it into a readable performance report.
frontend/src/lib/prices.ts: Fetches BNB and token prices from CoinGecko and provides formatting utilities for displaying prices.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function to merge Tailwind and conditional class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, wraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with wallet connection logic, network checks, balances, and deposit/withdraw UI.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and theme settings for the project.
project_state.json: Describes the current project state, issues, and feature requests related to balance fetching and UI layout.
